title: Is it okay to prepare for the NEET 2021 after stopping studying in 2010? - Quora
tags: Bachelor of Medicine and Bachelor of Surgery Degrees

response.answer_text: Bro, Its my first answer on Quora. Please pardon for grammatical mistakes. In your present scenario a number of factors are considerable. 1.Age: You stopped studying after 2010. I would consider you were in 10th class. Age:15 In 2020, you would be probably 25. But it's never too late to start. People crack NEET at 28. 2.Interest and Dedication. If you are interested and maintain a lebe of dedication, you will and can do it. Motivation apart, practically it gonna to be tough path but great attempts meet great results even on failing. “”A DEFEAT IN A BATTLE CAN TEACH YOU A NEW WAY TO WIN THE WAR.”” Do comment me if it found to be helpful. LOL
